name: ZenMoments
0:
”Alexa open Zen Moments”
”Alexa start Zen Moments”
”Alexa play Zen Moments”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zen moments
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Zen Moments features authentic soundscapes which will transport you to another place whilst you take a break, prepare for sleep, or meditate. Instead of one simple repeating sound Zen Moments features full environment sounds to really capture the feeling of the location. Close your eyes and take in the sound as if you were really there! There are lots of relaxing Zen Moments soundscapes to choose from including beach walk, swim with dolphins, countryside, rainforest and many more! 

When you choose a sound, you have the option to set a timer to stop the sounds automatically or to play continuously. 

To stop a sound at any time or exit the skill say "Alexa, Stop."
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
